TopicTitle: what causes planes to dive into surface ?

Articles.Content:
The last couple of days it's randomly occcuring that on landings next to runway the plane just flies through the surface and explodes.

There was one other encounter of this on the moon, the lander is half underground.

Any idea how to fix that ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-18T22:34:17Z" title="02/18/2015 10:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 18, 2015</time> by micr0wave**
I had a similar issue with kerbals on EVA. They would disappear into the textures of the ground, and upping the terrain graphic setting helped with clipping. Might help here as well?

More information will be needed to deal with this. Please [provide this information](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide) and submit it is a bug report in [that sub-forum](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/76-Support-%28unmodded-installs%29).
